Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 10), haskell-devscripts-minimal | haskell-devscripts (>= 0.8), cdbs, ghc (>= 8.4.3), ghc-prof, libghc-base16-bytestring-dev, libghc-base16-bytestring-prof, libghc-base64-bytestring-dev, libghc-base64-bytestring-prof, libghc-connection-dev, libghc-connection-prof, libghc-cryptonite-dev, libghc-cryptonite-prof, libghc-memory-dev, libghc-memory-prof, libghc-mime-mail-dev, libghc-mime-mail-prof, libghc-network-dev, libghc-network-prof, libghc-network-bsd-dev, libghc-network-bsd-prof
Build-Depends-Indep: ghc-doc, libghc-base16-bytestring-doc, libghc-base64-bytestring-doc, libghc-connection-doc, libghc-cryptonite-doc, libghc-memory-doc, libghc-mime-mail-doc, libghc-network-doc, libghc-network-bsd-doc
Package-List: libghc-smtp-mail-dev deb haskell optional arch=any libghc-smtp-mail-doc deb doc optional arch=all libghc-smtp-mail-prof deb haskell optional arch=any
